# removeAll(keepingCapacity:)

**Instance Method**

Removes all members from the set.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func removeAll(keepingCapacity keepCapacity: Bool = false)
```

## Removing Elements

- **filter(_:)**: Returns a new set containing the elements of the set that satisfy the given predicate.
- **remove(_:)**: Removes the specified element from the set.
- **remove(_:)**
- **removeFirst()**: Removes the first element of the set.
- **remove(at:)**: Removes the element at the given index of the set.
